Hey bud, I met with a company recently that asked me to broker their acquisition although that includes sourcing the buyer. I think Lutron would be ideal but having trouble finding the right people in corporate development type roles. Do you have any connections there or do you know the landscape at Lutron or insights in general.
Is it a Lehigh valley based lighting company?
My client prefers to stay anonymous
Also how do you get such a gig?
Help align me to Lutron, I'll cut you in, and show you my ways
I've got a contact at the evp level.
Wanna talk at 7pm?
Yeah. Just handing out candy
Call?
Can you give like a vague range of what you think the total value of the sale to be? Hard to know who and how to talk to people without that.
Also, let's do this man. I'm super bored.

Annual revenue $3.5M roughly

EBITA around $1.5-2M
Cool. Thanks. How many employees?
Asking now about number of W2 employees
Man, good on them on getting to that ebita.
Paul told me numbers that were double that which was concerning as Clark the cmo told me noooo more like half that haha
So I haven't seen the concrete financials but I believe Clark is telling more accurate details
Lol. Well I'm 5 years in and all I do is set fire to about 300k each month and watch the world burn.
Hahaha strong 'startup influencer for 30 something dog dads' vibes
13 and the 3 owners
What's your next step with all of this? I may theoretically have a business trip up your way shortly btw.
Dude, my dog just killed a rat at a restaurant
I've recreated this for you.

That's amazing. I wanna a second dog and I plan to name it DALLE. 

As for next steps, you free tomorrow? Let's chat. I have some traction outside of the Lutron track but we should game plan strategy.

👍 on traction from anywhere. I apparently know someone who sold his lighting business to a pe group. I think mostly I'm just enjoying doing something new here. If you get it sold elsewhere, still very awesome
Let's team up. Split the pie. Regardless. We will just go through the process together once someone gets a lead who wants more. From that point we just both work the deal
A lead Who wants more information *
I wanna learn this process
Yeah I don't know about you man but most of my reach outs right now have been purely about process.
We talk tomorrow. My dog is bleeding. Wtf. His 2nd rat in a week.
Ok great. I have a potential buyer. I'll fill you in. Text in the am ok good luck

I'm just TE'ing storage space

I dont think they are hitting that 1.2 EBITDA number this year. They're tracking about $900k below the income projection which that EBITDA is based off of. Their current net operating income for ytd is 20k? They seem to make more off selling tax credits than lights, which is a thing.
They probably feel like last year was a better year.
I'm not saying it's unsellable, just that it may have a wildly different valuation than they are expecting.
Yea you're not wrong. I'm free later today or have some time tomorrow. I want to get these numbers in front of Quinn and get his opinion.
Yeah after F1 I can talk. Like 5ish. F1 is life.

haha that's so European of you
